reviews.text: The hotel has a busy avenue on one side and a freeway on the other. The hotel needs an overall upgrade. But if you want a no-frills place, the hotel is fine. The price was certainly good - $100 per night.
reviews.title: Decent place

reviews.text: It's a good place to stay, everything was working good but the swimming pool is small.
reviews.title: A good place to stay

reviews.text: It's hard to get to it and we were driving around for a while.
reviews.title: At least it was Inexpensive
